A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some good moments\, but sloooow in a 'can we please move on'\, Kubrick-esque sort of way\, with battle scenes inspired by World War I combat methods (in space? with lasers? really?).  Unimaginative and disappointing.  I was so glad when Luke showed up again\, because I knew that it was finally about to end.
